intro1: Test a Psychic’s intuitive “testing” platform allows both Clients & Reader/Advisors to interact with each other in order to test the Reader’s abilities.
intro2: Readings can take place in any of 4 different platforms of your choice: CHAT, PHONE, EMAIL or SMS.
intro3: Test a Psychic’s intuitive “testing” platform allows both Clients & Reader/Advisors to interact with each other in order to test the Reader’s abilities.
intro4: With a variety of reading methods: Clairvoyance, Tarot, Medium, Astrology, Life Coaching etc.
type_password_again: Type in your new password again.
password_required: Password should be more than 6 characters and without spaces.
sent_passcode_your_email: A passcode will be sent to your new email address to verify your email account.
present_choose_role: Full instructions will be presented throughout the entire testing process.
note_fill_in_your_information: *We won’t call unless there is an issue with your account. We never share your personal info with anyone!
congratulation_content_tester: You are now a tester. That means you can get readings from the advisors and rate them. Click "Next" to start.!
